title: Boy dragged away by crocodile while bathing
body_lines: A 15-year-old boy who was bathing in the Maneruwa Lake in Anuradhapura was dragged away by a crocodile last evening.
Police said three boys have gone to bath in the lake when one of them was dragged away by the predator.
The deceased boy was a grade 11 student at the Maneruwa Maha Vidyalaya. The body of the boy was recovered by the police this morning.
